defines



C_PI_F

#define C_PI_F ((float) 3.141592654f)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: 32-bit float value of Pi

C_PI_D

#define C_PI_D ((double) 3.141592653589793)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: 64-bit double value of Pi

mptrf

#define mptrf(x) (float*)&(x)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: get math struct as float pointer

mptrd

#define mptrd(x) (double*)&(x)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: get math struct as double pointer
